enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
sentences: Richard Kinley noted a recent workshop on ways to improve the organization of the intergovernmental process (FCCC/SBI/2005/2).
Several Parties commented on the heavy workload at sessional meetings.
SWITZERLAND questioned a proposal to hold intersessional bilateral discussions on transparency grounds, and supported 'clustering' issues on the agenda.
